sys_ui_message.key: Specify the MIME type of the content. For example: application/json, text/plain, etc. To send an attachment, enter "attachment" and specify the sys_id of the attachment record.
sys_ui_message.message: Specify the MIME type of the content. For example: application/json, text/plain, etc. To send an attachment, enter "attachment" and specify the sys_id of the attachment record.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Specify the MIME type of the content. For example: application/json, text/plain, etc. To send an attachment, enter "attachment" and specify the sys_id of the attachment record.
